alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Pender, southeastern Robeson, Bladen, northwestern Brunswick, Columbus, southeastern Florence, Georgetown, southeastern Dillon, Horry, Marion and Williamsburg Counties through 915 AM EST... At 742 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Jerome to near Summerton. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Lumberton, Conway, Georgetown, Marion, Lake City, Whiteville, Mullins, Burgaw, Elizabethtown, Kingstree, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Red Hill, Murrells Inlet, Garden City, Horry, Rowan, Andrews and Fairmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina...and northeastern South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender; Robeson
